mapper.select: SELECT a.order_by thisOrderBy, b.id, b.order_by prevOrderBy FROM sys_eve_desktop a, sys_eve_desktop b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.order_by > a.order_by AND a.delete_flag = 0 AND b.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY b.order_by DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.order_by thisOrderBy, b.id, b.order_by prevOrderBy FROM sys_eve_desktop a, sys_eve_desktop b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.order_by > b.order_by AND a.delete_flag = 0 AND b.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY b.order_by ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.enabled, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_menu b WHERE b.desktop_id = a.id) allNum FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT (IFNULL(a.order_by, 0) + 1) orderBy FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY a.order_by DESC LIMIT 1
